DOC.brief_summary: Selected patient early stage breast cancer undergone conservative surgery randomize two arm : Hypofractionated Whole Breast Irradiation versus Accelerated Partial Breast Irradiation .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Study Postmenopausal Women With Early Stage Breast Cancer : WBI Versus APBI
DOC.detailed_description: Patients treat Hypofractionated Whole Breast Irradiation ( WBI ) receive SIB irradiation whole breast surgical bed two different dose level . Dose prescription 40.5 Gy PTVWB 48.0 Gy PTVboost 15 fraction 3 week , simultaneous integrate boost deliver 2.7 3.2Gy/fraction PTV respectively . Daily image guide radiotherapy ( IGRT ) generate treatment session patient verify set-up . Accelerated Partial Breast Irradiation ( APBI ) use external intensity -modulated radiotherapy ( VMAT RA ) deliver dose 30 Gy five 6-Gy/day fraction 10 day ( every day ) IGRT treatment .
DOC.criteria: 55 < Age < 70 Tumor size â‰¤ 2 cm pN0 ( SN biopsy ALND ) ER/PgR positive Margins > 5 mm ( either initial surgery reexcision ) Clips place surgical bed ( minimum 4 clip ) Unicentric No lymphovascular invasion Any grade No extensive intraductal component ( > 25 % ) Written informed consent Prior thoracic radiation therapy Oncoplastic surgery / No clip surgical bed Multicentric cancer Autoimmune disease , vasculitis , collagenopathy scleroderma may predispose late sequela
